metadata.name: away
metadata.description:
Welcome to my first NFT collection: 
'this surely is a dream'.  This collection of photos was taken in Malolo Lailai, Fiji. 

I really couldn't believe how beautiful this place was. I kept telling myself 'this surely is a dream'
 
It definitely felt like it, 
see for yourself. 

[shot on 35mm film on fujifilm pro 400h]
